hi.excerpt: माना परिबद्ध क्षेत्र $\left\{(x, y): 0 \leq 9 x \leq y^2, y \geq 3 x-6\right\}$ का क्षेत्रफल $A$ है। तो $6 A$ बराबर है _________

en.content: If the area of the region $\left\{(x, y):\left|4-x^2\right| \leq y \leq x^2, y \leq 4, x \geq 0\right\}$ is $\left(\frac{80 \sqrt{2}}{\alpha}-\beta\right), \alpha, \beta \in \mathbf{N}$, then $\alpha+\beta$ is equal to _________.
en.explanation:
$$\begin{aligned} &\text { Area = }\\ &\int_{\sqrt{2}}^2\left(x^2-\left(4-x^2\right)\right) d x+(2 \sqrt{2}-2) \times 4-\int_2^{2 \sqrt{2}}\left(x^2-4\right) d x \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & =\left[\frac{2 x^3}{3}-4 x\right]_{\sqrt{2}}^2+8 \sqrt{2}-8-\left[\frac{x^3}{3}-4 x\right]_2^{2 \sqrt{2}} \\ & =\frac{40 \sqrt{2}}{3}-16 \\ & \Rightarrow \alpha=6, \beta=16 \Rightarrow \alpha+\beta=22 \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: यदि क्षेत्र $\left\{(x, y):\left|4-x^2\right| \leq y \leq x^2, y \leq 4, x \geq 0\right\}$ का क्षेत्रफल $\left(\frac{80 \sqrt{2}}{\alpha}-\beta\right), \alpha, \beta \in \mathbf{N}$ है, तो $\alpha+\beta$ बराबर है ________ .
hi.explanation:
$$\begin{aligned} &\text{क्षेत्रफल =}\\ &\int_{\sqrt{2}}^2\left(x^2-\left(4-x^2\right)\right)dx+(2\sqrt{2}-2)\times4-\int_{2}^{2\sqrt{2}}\left(x^2-4\right)dx \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} &=\left[\tfrac{2x^3}{3}-4x\right]_{\sqrt{2}}^2+8\sqrt{2}-8-\left[\tfrac{x^3}{3}-4x\right]_2^{2\sqrt{2}}\\ &=\tfrac{40\sqrt{2}}{3}-16\\ &\Rightarrow\alpha=6,\;\beta=16\;\Rightarrow\alpha+\beta=22 \end{aligned}$$

en.content: If the area of the region $ \{(x, y) : 1 + x^2 \leq y \leq \min \{x+7, 11-3x\}\} $ is $ A $, then $ 3A $ is equal to :
en.explanation: $$\begin{aligned} & A=\int_{-2}^1\left(x+7-x^2-1\right) d x+\int_1^2\left(11+3 x-x^2-1\right) d x \\ & =\left[\frac{x^2}{2}+6 x-\frac{x^3}{3}\right]_{-2}^1+\left[10 x-\frac{3 x^2}{2}-\frac{x^3}{3}\right]_1^2 \\ & =\frac{50}{3} \Rightarrow 3 A=50 \quad \text { Option (1) } \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: यदि क्षेत्र $\left\{(x, y): 1+x^2 \leqslant y \leqslant \min \{x+7,11-3 x\}\right\}$ का क्षेत्रफल A है, तो 3 A बराबर है :
hi.explanation: $$\begin{aligned} &A=\int_{-2}^1\bigl(x+7 - x^2 - 1\bigr)\,dx + \int_1^2\bigl(11+3x - x^2 - 1\bigr)\,dx \\ &=\Bigl[\frac{x^2}{2} + 6x - \frac{x^3}{3}\Bigr]_{-2}^1 + \Bigl[10x - \frac{3x^2}{2} - \frac{x^3}{3}\Bigr]_1^2 \\ &= \frac{50}{3} \;\Rightarrow\; 3A = 50 \quad \text{विकल्प (1)} \end{aligned}$$

en.content: If the area of the region bounded by the curves $y=4-\frac{x^2}{4}$ and $y=\frac{x-4}{2}$ is equal to $\alpha$, then $6 \alpha$. equals
en.explanation:
$y=4-\frac{x^2}{4}$ and $y=\frac{x-4}{2}$

$$\begin{aligned} & \text { Area }=\int_\limits{-6}^4\left(4-\frac{x^2}{4}-\frac{x}{2}+2\right) d x \\ & =\left[6 x-\frac{x^3}{12}-\frac{x^2}{4}\right]_{-6}^4 \\ & =6(4+6)-\left(\frac{64}{12}+\frac{216}{12}\right)-\left(\frac{16}{4}-\frac{36}{4}\right) \\ & =60-\frac{70}{3}+5 \\ & \alpha=\frac{125}{3} \\ & 6 \alpha=6 \times \frac{125}{3}=250 \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: यदि वक्रों $y=4-\frac{x^2}{4}$ और $y=\frac{x-4}{2}$ से परिबद्ध क्षेत्र का क्षेत्रफल $\alpha$ है, तो $6 \alpha$ बराबर है
hi.explanation:
$y=4-\frac{x^2}{4}$ और $y=\frac{x-4}{2}$

$$ \begin{aligned} & \text{क्षेत्रफल} = \int_{-6}^4 \left(4 - \frac{x^2}{4} - \frac{x}{2} + 2 \right) dx \\ & = \left[6x - \frac{x^3}{12} - \frac{x^2}{4}\right]_{-6}^4 \\ & = 6(4 + 6) - \Bigl(\frac{64}{12} + \frac{216}{12}\Bigr) - \Bigl(\frac{16}{4} - \frac{36}{4}\Bigr) \\ & = 60 - \frac{70}{3} + 5 \\ & \alpha = \frac{125}{3} \\ & 6\alpha = 6 \times \frac{125}{3} = 250 \end{aligned} $$

en.content: The area of the region bounded by the curve $y=\max \{|x|, x|x-2|\}$, the $x$-axis and the lines $x=-2$ and $x=4$ is equal to__________
en.explanation:
Area =

$$\begin{aligned} & \frac{1}{2} \times 2 \times 2+\int_0^1\left(2 x-x^2\right) d x+\int_1^3 x d x+\int_3^4\left(x^2-2 x\right) d x \\ & =2+\left[\frac{2 x^2}{2}-\frac{x^3}{3}\right]_0^1+\left[\frac{x^2}{2}\right]_1^3+\left[\frac{x^3}{3}-\frac{2 x^2}{2}\right]_3^4 \end{aligned}$$

= 12 square units

hi.content: वक्र $y=\max \{|x|, x|x-2|\}, x$-अक्ष ओर रेखाओं $x=-2, x=4$ से परिबद्ध क्षेत्र का क्षेत्रफल है _______
hi.explanation:
क्षेत्रफल =

$$ \begin{aligned} & \frac{1}{2} \times 2 \times 2 + \int_0^1\left(2x - x^2\right)\,dx + \int_1^3 x\,dx + \int_3^4\left(x^2 - 2x\right)\,dx \\ &= 2 + \left[\frac{2x^2}{2} - \frac{x^3}{3}\right]_0^1 + \left[\frac{x^2}{2}\right]_1^3 + \left[\frac{x^3}{3} - \frac{2x^2}{2}\right]_3^4 \end{aligned}$$

= 12 वर्ग ईकाइयाँ

hi.title: JEE Main 2025 (Online) 3rd April Morning Shift
hi.subTitle: Area Under The Curves • Mathematics
hi.excerpt: वक्र $y=\max \{|x|, x|x-2|\}, x$-अक्ष ओर रेखाओं $x=-2, x=4$ से परिबद्ध क्षेत्र का क्षेत्रफल है _______

en.content:
Let $f:[0, \infty) \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$ be a differentiable function such that

$f(x)=1-2 x+\int_0^x e^{x-t} f(t) d t$ for all $x \in[0, \infty)$.

Then the area of the region bounded by $y=f(x)$ and the coordinate axes is
en.explanation:
$$\because f(x)=1-2 x+\int_0^x e^{x-t} f(t) d t$$

or, $f(x)=1-2 x+e^x \int_0^x e^{-t} f(t) d t$

on differentiating both sides w.r.t. $x$ we get

$$\begin{aligned} & f^{\prime}(x)=-2+e^x \int_0^x e^{-t} f(t) d t+e^x \cdot e^{-x} f(x) \\ & f^{\prime}(x)=-2+f(x)+2 x-1+f(x)\{\text { from eq. (1) \}} \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & \therefore \quad f(x)-2 f(x)=2 x-3 \\ & \text { I.F. }=e^{\int-2 d x}=e^{-2 x} \\ & \therefore \quad e^{-2 x} \cdot f(x)=\int e^{-2 x}(2 x-3) d x \\ & e^{-2 x} \cdot f(x)=(2 x-3) \cdot \frac{e^{-2 x}}{-2}-\int 2 \cdot \frac{e^{-2 x}}{-2} d x \\ & e^{-2 x} \cdot f(x)=\frac{(2 x-3) e^{-2 x}}{-2}+\frac{e^{-2 x}}{-2}+c \\ & f(x)=-x+1+c^{\prime} e^{2 x} \\ & \because \quad f(x)=1 \text { from eq. (1) } \\ & \therefore \quad 1=0+1+c^{\prime} \Rightarrow c^{\prime}=0 \\ & \therefore \quad f(x)=-x+1 \end{aligned}$$

$\Rightarrow \quad$ Area $=\frac{1}{2}$

hi.content: माना एक अवकलनीय फलन $f:[0, \infty) \rightarrow \mathbb{R}$ के लिए $f(x)=1-2 x+\int_0^x e^{x-t} f(t) d t, x \in[0, \infty)$ है। तो $y=f(x)$ और निर्देशांक अक्षों से परिबद्ध क्षेत्र का क्षेत्रफल है
hi.explanation:
$$\because f(x)=1-2x+\int_0^x e^{x-t} f(t) d t$$

अथवा, $f(x)=1-2x+e^x \int_0^x e^{-t} f(t) d t$

दोनों पक्षों को $x$ के सापेक्ष अवकलन करने पर हमें मिलता है

$$\begin{aligned} & f^{\prime}(x)=-2+e^x \int_0^x e^{-t} f(t) d t+e^x \cdot e^{-x} f(x) \\ & f^{\prime}(x)=-2+f(x)+2x-1+f(x)\{\text { समीकरण (1) से } \} \end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned} & \therefore \quad f(x)-2 f(x)=2x-3 \\ & \text { गुणांक }=e^{\int-2 d x}=e^{-2x} \\ & \therefore \quad e^{-2x} \cdot f(x)=\int e^{-2x}(2x-3) d x \\ & e^{-2x} \cdot f(x)=(2x-3) \cdot \frac{e^{-2x}}{-2}-\int 2 \cdot \frac{e^{-2x}}{-2} d x \\ & e^{-2x} \cdot f(x)=\frac{(2x-3) e^{-2x}}{-2}+\frac{e^{-2x}}{-2}+c \\ & f(x)=-x+1+c^{\prime} e^{2x} \\ & \because \quad f(x)=1 \text { समीकरण (1) से } \\ & \therefore \quad 1=0+1+c^{\prime} \Rightarrow c^{\prime}=0 \\ & \therefore \quad f(x)=-x+1 \end{aligned}$$

$\Rightarrow \quad$ क्षेत्रफल $=\frac{1}{2}$

en.content: If the area of the region $\{(x, y):|x-5| \leq y \leq 4 \sqrt{x}\}$ is $A$, then $3 A$ is equal to _________.
en.explanation: $$\begin{aligned} & \text { Area }=\int_1^{25} 4 \sqrt{x} d x-\frac{1}{2} \times(5-1) \cdot 4-\frac{1}{2} \times(25-5) \times 20 \\ & =4\left[\frac{2}{3} x^{\frac{3}{2}}\right]_1^{25}-8-200=\frac{368}{3} \\ & \Rightarrow 3 A=368 \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: यदि क्षेत्र $\{(x, y):|x-5| \leq y \leq 4 \sqrt{x}\}$ का क्षेत्रफल $A$ है, तो $3 A$ बराबर है _________
hi.explanation: $$\begin{aligned} & \text{क्षेत्रफल} = \int_1^{25} 4 \sqrt{x}\, dx - \frac{1}{2} \times (5-1) \cdot 4 - \frac{1}{2} \times (25-5) \times 20 \\ & = 4\left[\frac{2}{3}x^{\frac{3}{2}}\right]_1^{25} - 8 - 200 = \frac{368}{3} \\ & \Rightarrow 3A = 368 \end{aligned}$$

en.content: The area of the region $\{(x, y):|x-y| \leq y \leq 4 \sqrt{x}\}$ is
en.explanation:
$|x-y| \leq y \leq 4 \sqrt{x}$

$$\begin{aligned} & \text { Area }=\int_0^{64}\left(4 \sqrt{x}-\frac{x}{2}\right) d x \\ & \left.=\frac{4 x^{3 / 2}}{\frac{3}{2}}-\frac{x^2}{4}\right]_0^{64} \end{aligned}$$

hi.content: क्षेत्र $\{(x, y):|x-y| \leq y \leq 4 \sqrt{x}\}$ का क्षेत्रफल है:
hi.explanation:
$|x-y| \leq y \leq 4 \sqrt{x}$

$$\begin{aligned} & \text{क्षेत्रफल} = \int_0^{64}\bigl(4\sqrt{x} - \tfrac{x}{2}\bigr)\,dx \\ & \left.= \frac{4x^{3/2}}{\frac{3}{2}} - \frac{x^2}{4}\right]_0^{64} \end{aligned}$$
